text:
Hey Olivia, Nice to meet you!! And the pleasure is mine :slightly_smiling_face:
Feel free  to ask me whatever you want! Just say that I'm from Spain , so english is not my first language... If something that I say doesn't make sense, please, let me know :smile:

Awesome!! I speak a little bit of Spanish but writing in it is definitely not my strong point. I’m currently blocking out a quick animation, I’ll send you over a playblast by Monday and your critique on it would be amazing! :relaxed::+1::skin-tone-3:
